content: you need a wider heel work a few less right purlwise bring the yarn to the back between the row you re only going to be turning your heel over n2 needles slip the stitch from the right needle to the left turn your work row 1 - knit across n1 in the stitch pattern and knit to the last stitch on n2 move your yarn to the front of your work as if you were going to purl then wrap the stitch and turn your work cast on row 2 - slip the first stitch purl 29 31 33 stitches to the last using your circular needle you re going to cast on i highly stitch on your needle then wrap and turn recommend using judy s magic cast on http //knitty com/ issuespring06/featmagiccaston html or the turkish cast on row 3 -slip the first stitch knit 28 30 32 stitches wrap the http //fluffyknitterdeb blogspot com/2005/10/knitting-made- next stitch and turn easier-turkish-cast-on html row 4 - slip the first stitch purl 27 29 31 stitches wrap the cast on 10 12 16 stitches on each needle next stitch and turn knit 1 round and place your stitch marker optional at the row 5 - slip the first stitch knit 26 28 30 stitches wrap the beginning of your round next stitch and turn note your first needle is now n1 which holds the instep stitches row 6 - slip the first stitch purl 25 27 29 stitches wrap the your second needle is n2 which is your sole later heel stitches next stitch and turn row 1 *k1 kfb k to two stitches before the end of n1 kfb k1 row 7 - slip the first stitch knit 24 26 28 stitches wrap the repeat from * for n2 next stitch and turn row 2 k all stitches across n1 and n2 row 8 - slip the first stitch purl 23 25 27 stitches wrap the repeat these two rounds until you have 30 32 34 stitches on next stitch and turn each needle 60 64 68 stitches total © 2021 mary lukas || www purlkitty com || mary@purlkitty com || for personal use only || page 2 row 9 - slip the first stitch knit 22 24 26 stitches wrap the row 20 - slip the first stitch purl to the first double wrapped next stitch and turn stitch pick up both wraps and purl them together with the stitch wrap the next stitch and turn row 10 - slip the first stitch purl 21 23 25 stitches wrap the next stitch and turn continue row 19 & 20 until all of the wrapped stitches have been worked and begin working in the round you may want to pick row 11 - slip the first stitch knit 20 22 24 stitches wrap the up stitches between your first and second needle to close any next stitch and turn gaps knit these stitches together until you have 30 32
